import React from 'react' const Training = () => { return (

Training / Life

Life Insurance

The "Point of sales person" can sell Life Insurance Profucts filed with and approved by the Authority, which may

  • Pure Term Insurance product with ot without return of premium Non-Linked (Non-Participating) endowment product

    Immedite Anuuity Product

    Any other product / product category, If permitted by the authority.

  • Detailed Guidlelines with reaard to Point of Sale- Life Insurance Products are issued separately
) } export default Training
